ygData.subject: Brutechopper info and **spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: I know how to get the Brutechopper now. Damage 16 and delay of 50. I dont recall the weight off hand. It is a quest and lore item, and completing this quest
ygData.messageBody:
I know how to get the Brutechopper now.

Damage 16 and delay of 50. I dont' recall the weight off hand.
It is a quest and lore item, and completing this quest gives you a 50/50 shot of getting the Brutechopper or Midnight Maul.

The quest takes place in Innothule swamp and the weapon and quest is only for Ogres, Trolls, Barbarians, and Dwarves (3 Large races and one small?).

I will post more details if anyone desires. I do not know if a "good" race can complete the quest.
